sentences.en: Because Dunhuang Grotto locates the Gobi area havingatrOcious weather, muras are threatened andtO be very frail.
sentences.cn: 然而, 由于自然风化的破坏以及重大自然灾害的威胁,这个人类艺术的宝库变得非常脆弱.

sentences.en: For months they traveled through the sands of the Gobi.
sentences.cn: 好几个月他们一直在戈壁沙漠中走.

sentences.en: Gobi Desert is now seven times bigger than Britain.
sentences.cn: 戈壁滩现在比英国大七倍.

sentences.en: Gobi partner Limited company's partner Xie Shijun appraised.
sentences.cn: 戈壁合伙人有限公司的合伙人谢士骏评价说.

sentences.en: He had prospected for minerals everywhere from the Gobi Desert to the Transvaal.
sentences.cn: 他已在从戈壁沙漠到德兰士瓦的无数地方勘探过矿藏。

sentences.en: He is on a trek through the South Gobi desert.
sentences.cn: 他正徒步穿越南戈壁沙漠。

sentences.en: Or you can go exploring for fossils of the earliest residents of the Gobi - dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 或去探索戈壁滩早期的原居民 - 恐龙化石.

sentences.en: Scientists working in the Gobi Desert have shed new light on the life of dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 在戈壁滩上工作的科学家们使人们对恐龙的生活有了新的认识.

sentences.en: The ass For ass, the vast Gobi is a heaven.
sentences.cn: 野驴》茫茫的荒漠,是野驴的自由世界.

sentences.en: The capsule is scheduled to touch down near the launch station in the Gobi Desert.
sentences.cn: 宇宙飞船座舱预定降落在戈壁沙漠发射中心附近.

sentences.en: The fragile environment of gobi desert was destroyed because of mining work.
sentences.cn: 采矿在不同程度上破坏了戈壁滩原本脆弱的生态环境.

sentences.en: The remains of such sand exist in the Sahara and Gobi Deserts alongthe Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.cn: 这类灰烬的残骸现位于撒哈拉沙漠、戈壁滩沙漠及大西洋海底.

sentences.en: The surface of Bayanhaote basin is covered largely by desert and gobi.
sentences.cn: 巴彦浩特盆地地表大部分被沙漠和戈壁覆盖.

sentences.en: The train keeps driving, endless Gobi desert everywhere are wrapped around by it.
sentences.cn: 于是火车继续开着, 四处都是戈壁,荒无人烟却广阔的苍劲.

sentences.en: These eggs were found in the Gobi Desert by a group of scientists in the 1920 s.
sentences.cn: 这些蛋是一群科学家于二十世纪二十年代在戈壁大沙漠发现的.

phrases.tran_cn: 戈壁沙漠（蒙古和中国西北部）
